name: What Were They Smoking?
description:
Everyone knows that True Creativity is born from doing Drugs.

Inspired by our favorite games, cartoons, snacks and sativas, we set out to prove that you've got to be smoking some really good stuff to both create and experience art in the most powerful way.

This piece showcases Real Gamers' reactions to projects in the A MAZE exhibition, and The Unbelievable Creative Potential of Weed.

DoobieSoft
2019

Art by Dale, Programming by Darren.
